 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כַּוָּה‎</span> [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>GGA 1884. 1019</sup>] **noun feminine** ==window== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כַּוְּתָא‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, compare [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>Lex. 91</sup> (below \* <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">), hence Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***, as loan-word [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>13</sup>); — plural absolute <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כַּ וִּין‎</span> <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פְּתִיחָן‎</span> [[Dan.6.11|Dan 6:11]] (compare [[BDB#S-C|S-C]]<sup>J6</sup>).
